text: Yeah that was about 2 days after the game released. D3 was a lot of fun until you hit lvl 60 and Inferno. It'll take a pretty big patch or expansion for me (and a lot of other people it seems) to come back to it.

text: I bought this game and intend to play it soon. From what I've heard it should help wash out the bad taste Diablo 3 left in my mouth (very disappointed in that game). I don't intend to play multiplayer as I did with the first game though, I know I'll get addicted to it and my backlog is way too big right now. The terran always seem to have the best themes in this series. The first time I listened to this track, I actually stopped what I was doing when it got to 3:45, I love it. Space country.
author: SupraDarky
